ygData.subject: Re: Why did you choose to play a paladin?
ygData.msgSnippet: Frankly mine was a roleplay choice.  I am playing a young noble who wants to be a soldier.  Thus a knight.  And therefore the only class that really comes
ygData.messageBody:
Frankly mine was a roleplay choice. I am playing a young noble who wants to
be a soldier. Thus a knight. And therefore the only class that really
comes close to that for the high elves is the Paladin.

Syrel Feyn
